SELECT d.o_date o_date, p.sales FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE('20201201','YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS o_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(sysdate)- TO_DATE('2020-12-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)) d LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') o_date, SUM(p_price*p_count) sales FROM porder_list GROUP BY TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')) p ON d.o_date=p.o_date
WHERE d.o_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
WHERE d.o_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-1),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY o_date

SELECT d.o_date, d.p_cate, p.sales FROM ( SELECT * FROM category,( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE('2020-12-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS o_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(sysdate)- TO_DATE('2020-12-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) )) d LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR((o.o_date),'YYYY-MM-DD') o_date, p.p_cate, SUM(o.p_count*o.p_price) sales FROM porder_list o INNER JOIN product p ON o.p_id = p.p_id GROUP BY p.p_cate, TO_CHAR((o.o_date),'YYYY-MM-DD')) p ON d.o_date=p.o_date AND d.p_cate = p.p_cate
WHERE d.o_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
WHERE d.o_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-1),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY d.o_date,d.p_cate

SELECT p.p_id, p.sales, ceil(p.period/7) period, i.i_fname, p.p_name, p.p_cate, p.p_price FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum, p_id, sales, period, p_name ,p_cate, p_price FROM( SELECT o.p_id, o.sales, ceil(sysdate -p.p_date) period, p.p_name, p.p_cate, p.p_price FROM (SELECT p_id, SUM(p_count*p_price) sales FROM porder_list GROUP BY p_id) o INNER JOIN product p ON p.p_id =o.p_id ORDER BY sales DESC)) WHERE rownum <5) p INNER JOIN product_image i ON p.p_id = i.p_id ORDER BY sales DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMMDD') o_date, NVL(SUM(p_count*p_price),0) sales FROM porder_list WHERE TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')-7 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY o_date

SELECT o.m_country m_country,SUM(o.p_count*o.p_price) sales, SUM(o.p_count*o.p_price)/(SELECT SUM(p_count*p_price) FROM porder_list)*100 ratio FROM (SELECT* FROM porder_list p INNER JOIN member m ON p.m_code = m.m_code)o WHERE TO_CHAR(o.o_date,'YYYYMM')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMM') GROUP BY o.m_country ORDER BY ratio DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMM') o_date, NVL(SUM(p_count*p_price),0) sales FROM porder_list WHERE TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMM')>TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMM')-5 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMM') ORDER BY o_date
SELECT LOWER(p_root) p_root, NVL(SUM(p_count*p_price),0) sales FROM porder_list WHERE TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMM')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMM') GROUP BY p_root ORDER BY p_root
SELECT NVL(SUM(p_count*p_price),0) sales FROM porder_list WHERE TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMM')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMM')
SELECT NVL(SUM(p_count*p_price),0) sales FROM porder_list WHERE TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMMDD')=TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT count(m_code) count FROM member WHERE TO_CHAR(m_date,'YYYYMM')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMM')
SELECT count(m_code) count FROM member WHERE TO_CHAR(m_date,'YYYYMMDD')=TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT count(p_id) count FROM product WHERE TO_CHAR(p_date,'YYYYMM')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMM')
SELECT NVL(SUM(p_count),0) count FROM porder_list WHERE TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMM')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMM')
SELECT NVL(SUM(p_count),0) count FROM porder_list WHERE TO_CHAR(o_date,'YYYYMM')=TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYYMMDD')
